Entry.JapaneseText: ……ああなる前は<Veigue>さんの言ったとおり、 みんな<Cyan>ご近所さん<White>だったんですよね。
Entry.EnglishText: ...It's just as you said, before all of this, we were all <Cyan>neighbors<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……なのに、ある日突然、 ガジュマだ、ヒューマだと……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah... And in spite of that, suddenly one day, it was Huma this, Gajuma that...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そう言えば、<Veigue>さんの村の おばさん……どうしてるんでしょうね？
Entry.EnglishText: ...That reminds me of that lady from your village... I wonder how she's doing?

Entry.JapaneseText: ポプラおばさん…… 元気だといいがな……
Entry.EnglishText: Aunt Poplar... I hope she's doing well...
